definition: permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
Hang Seng index (of Hong Kong stock market)

pinyin: Heng2 sheng1 Zhong1 zi1 qi3 ye4 zhi3 shu4

sentences.english: All but nine stocks on the 42-member Hang Seng Index advanced.
sentences.chinese: 恒生指数的42成员中只有九支股票上涨。

sentences.english: Handsome Arts &Crafts Co. Ltd. , Quanzhou was founded in 1991.
sentences.chinese: 始建于1991年的泉州市恒生工艺礼品有限公司。

sentences.english: The benchmark Hang Seng Index has gained 6 percent so farin 2010.
sentences.chinese: 截至目前，恒生指数上涨了6%。

sentences.english: The stock is slated to be added to the benchmark Hang Seng index.
sentences.chinese: 该公司股票将成为香港基准恒生指数的成份股。

sentences.english: Copyright. Hang Seng Indexes Company Limited. All rights reserved.
sentences.chinese: 恒生指数有限公司，版权所有。

definition: Hang Seng index (of Hong Kong stock market)
Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC)
Hong Kong Stock Exchange/abbr. for 香港交易所
the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
red chip stocks (Chinese company stocks incorporated outside mainland China and listed in the Hong Kong stock exchange)
FTSE (British provider of stock exchange indices such as FTSE 100)
